name: ingresso-uscita-server
description: Server per sistema di gestione timbrature

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dir='./reports';fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(f=>{if(f.startsWith('attendance_report_')||f.startsWith('BACKUP_'))fs.unlinkSync(path.join(dir,f))});console.log('âœ“ Reports temporanei eliminati')"
